DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial examine change hormonal marker associate acne among adult moderate/severe acne randomize low glycemic index glycemic load diet usual eating plan two week .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Low Glycemic Load Diet Hormonal Markers Associated With Acne
DOC.detailed_description: The objective randomize control trial investigate impact low glycemic index/load eat plan endocrine aspect acne . Specifically , study examine change blood biochemical marker acne among adult acne follow modify carbohydrate ( low glycemic index/load ) eating plan usual eating plan two week . An external sponsor , Nutrisystem® , provide low glycemic index/load food study participant randomize intervention group two week . Study outcomes include change glucose , insulin , insulin resistance , insulin-like growth factor-1 , insulin-like growth factor bind protein-3 concentration .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥18.5 < 30.0 kg/m2 History moderate severe facial acne least 6 month Able read speak English language > 10 % weight change within last 6 month Taking medication know alter blood glucose insulin concentration Medical history polycystic ovarian syndrome , type 1 diabetes , type 2 diabetes , pre diabetes Low carbohydrate ( < 45 % total energy carbohydrate ) , glycemic index , glycemic load diet Female participant pregnant lactate pregnant lactating within last year Current use pacemaker battery operate implant Facial hair would make difficult health care provider ass facial acne .
